creator: eTrawler
descriptionHtml:
Then you have landed on the right app.

Save up to 40% on car hire as compared to direct to brand sites. Enter your search criteria and compare over 1,500 car hire supplier ratings, make, models, prices and more – in 40,000 locations including airport, downtown, or city locations across the globe. Find the best car hire for your needs with Argus Car Hire in just 3 easy steps;

1. Enter your pick up and drop off information
2. Select from a large variety of car sizes
3. Enter your details and pay for your selected car – the voucher is then saved to the Argus Car Hire app, which means you can collect the car with your mobile phone!

Compare & SAVE up to 40% on car hire
- Compare best prices from the top suppliers
- Search 40,000+ locations worldwide
- Exclusive deals and discounts from top car rental brands only available in our app.

Argus Car Hire compare all the top global brands alongside local brands to find you the best car rental at the best price. This includes brands like: Enterprise Rent-A-Car, Alamo, Budget, Dollar, Thrifty, Europcar, Hertz, Avis and lots more. You can easily search based on your current location to find your nearest brand with availability for those last-minute trips.
Pick up car with your phone - No printing needed

Once you make a booking on our app, the booking information is saved to your phone which will allow you to easily access your voucher offline. Booked already or on another device? No Problem. With My Bookings, sync and save any previous bookings & use your offline eVoucher on pick up.

Other great features of our app include;
• Paperless booking voucher
• Pre-register your details with certain suppliers – this will cut down on time at the rental desk
• Works offline – no Wi-Fi needed
• Easily amend bookings through app
• Add your requests for optional extras, such as additional driver, GPS and child seats
• Here to help – customer care at the touch of a button
• Search FAQ’s
And more…

With over 40,000 locations, including airports as well as downtown and city locations, Argus Car Hire have convenient car rentals to suit all your holiday or business needs.
We have partnered with over 1,500 top global brands to find you the best car rental at the best price. Check out our cars and savings in hotspots like London, Dublin, Faro, Alicante, Malaga, Edinburgh, Brisbane, Melbourne, Cape Town, Dubai, Sydney and thousands of other locations. You name your destination, Argus Car Hire has you covered!

We at Argus Car Hire have helped millions of holiday makers explore UK, Spain, Portugal, France, Italy, USA and over 170 countries! Our app will help you see all the important rental information as well as customer ratings, so you can be sure you know which company can offer the best car hire for you.

FAQs

How does it work?
Argus Car Hire gather prices from all the top car hire suppliers globally and show you everything you need to know; from daily pricing to customer ratings at each location. With millions of happy car rental customers, we are confident you will get a great car for your next trip.

Who do I rent my car from?
Argus Car Hire work closely with the most popular and experienced car hire companies worldwide to ensure you get the best value from your car rental. Our app will help you see all the important rental information as well as customer ratings, so you can be sure you know which car hire company is best for you.

Argus Car Hire is rated 9.3 out of 10 stars on Trustpilot, so you know you’re getting the best car hire service.

Plus, we have 24-hour phone customer service is also just a few taps away. So, if you have any car hire queries, you can simply call the number in the app for top quality service.

If you would like to send us feedback, please do get in touch; app@arguscarhire.com

We would love to hear from you:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/arguscarhire
Twitter: https://twitter.com/arguscarhire
